sources.title: Lookin' Italian (1994) Matt Leblanc, Denise Richards, Jay Acavone | Crime Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
A former mob soldier tries to live a quiet life working in a used bookstore, but his life is turned upside down by the arrival of his hotheaded nephew, who is instantly drawn to the gangster lifestyle.

Director & Writer: Guy Magar
Cast: Matt Leblanc, Jay Acavone, Denise Richards, Lou Rawls
Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/Ewp3C3nqk7U

00:00:00 Introduction
00:01:58 Opening scene shootout
00:03:01 5 years later
00:07:01 Nephew Anthony (Matt LeBlanc) & #1 Bridget 
00:13:44 Vinny & Don Dinardo
00:18:29 #2 Anthony at it again
00:29:35 Denise 'Stephanie' Richards #3
00:32:54 Dreams of Hollywood
00:41:13 Girls #4 & #5
00:51:25 Boy been brawlin
01:00:52 #6 Dominique
01:09:55 The morning after
01:22:44 Willy says...

This video is also available in French, and subtitled in more than 30+ languages. Click on ⚙️ and choose subtitles and/or audio tracks.

metadata.Plot: After an unfortunate incident causes him to leave the "family business" and move to Los Angeles, Vinny Pallazzo is living a quiet life. When his nephew, Anthony, moves in with him, Vinny slowly learns to live life to the fullest again. However, Anthony is young, and is living life in the fast lane. He brings out the demons from Vinny's past. Now Vinny must try to stop Anthony from making the same mistakes that changed his life forever.
metadata.Actors: Jay Acovone, Matt LeBlanc, Stephanie Richards
